verbs.description: President Trump [V: has] arrived in Singapore for what will be a historic summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un
[ARG1: President Trump] has [V: arrived] [ARG4: in Singapore] [ARGM-PRP: for what will be a historic summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un]
President Trump has arrived in Singapore for what [V: will] be a historic summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un
President Trump has arrived in Singapore for [ARG1: what] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: be] [ARG2: a historic summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un]
